title: ‘Response Time is Critical’: CPA President Adam Hansen Says Major Changes Needed after Recent Deaths
content:
Rider's association president Hansen comments after the tragic passing of Muriel Furrer, André Drege and Gino Mäder: 'There was clearly a mistake in tracking where the riders were.'

Read the full article at ‘Response Time is Critical’: CPA President Adam Hansen Says Major Changes Needed after Recent Deaths on Velo.
author: ahood
